title: Best of The Herd: 12/11/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/11/2019
description:
Colin says the Cowboys have become too insular as a team and business and explains why that hurts them. He says the hits on Lamar Jackson are only going to get worse as he succeeds more in the NFL. FS1's Nick Wright comes on to yell at Colin about his Chiefs finally beating the Patriots. Plus, a former player takes a shot at the Browns training staff and Colin says Baker is to blame for starting the fire.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
